name: Quack
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Quack and have them choose clockwise or counter-clockwise. Put the Drunk reminder token on the closest good player seated in the chosen direction.
otherNightReminder: If alive, move the Drunk reminder token to the next good player seated in the chosen direction.
ability: You start choosing a direction; your closest good neighbor in that direction is Drunk, even if dead. Each night*, the drunkenness moves to the next good player in the chosen direction.
